title: Baosheng Dadi Zhi Qi Er Duo Bao
synopsis: "The Wonderful Treasure of Baosheng Emperor" tells the story of Wu Kui's determination to study medicine since he was a child. After many trials, he successfully worshipped Bai Bodhi as his teacher and embarked on the journey of medicine. On the remote Kunlun Mountains, the medical sage Wujizi devoted himself to practicing, just to decipher the "wordless heavenly book", to master the peak medical skills, and to benefit the people of Li people. However, even if the opportunity is not here, even if he does his best, he can only regret to retreat. Before the retreat, he explained to his apprentice Bai Bo that he was looking for a soul boy with the five spirits, four difficulties, and three treasures in his hands. After finding, together with Xuanfeng who went down the mountain privately, he accepted the soul boy as an apprentice, and selflessly inherited the essence of traditional Chinese medicine of yin and yang. He also assisted the soul boy to gather the five spirits, overcome the four difficulties, and win the three treasures. With a mysterious task, Bai Bodhi traveled all the way to the village where Wu Kui lived, and began to look for a magical soul boy. This soul boy later became a generation of God of Medicine-Baosheng Emperor.(translated from iqiyi)
